title: Power Stop Brakes on a souped up Ford Raptor - Truck U Episode 917 - (segment)
description: How can you jump a Ford Raptor even further? Put a supercharger in it. Matt and Bruno team up with Roush Performance to get the maximum power output of a stock Raptor. With all of that power, stock brake pads and rotors just won't cut it. That's why, in this segment, The guys at Truck U put on a Z36 Extreme Performance Truck and Tow brake kit from Power Stop. This souped up Ford Raptor won't just stop, it will Power Stop!
tags: Power Stop Brake Kit, Powerstop, performance brake kit, Z36 Extreme Truck & Tow Brake Kit, Ford Raptor, performance brakes
